original_text: Then some of our companions went to the tomb and found it just as the women had said, but they did not see Jesus.”
korean_text: 또 우리와 함께 한 자 중에 두어 사람이 무덤에 가 과연 여자들이 말한 바와 같음을 보았으나 예수는 보지 못하였느니라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Then some of our companions went to the tomb
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 우리 동행자 중 몇 사람이 무덤에 갔으나

sentences.original_text: and found it just as the women had said
but they did not see Jesus
